thread.title: General Mills, Maker of Cheerios, Now Wants to Feed Your Dog, Too

author: Annie Gasparro
title: General Mills, Maker of Cheerios, Now Wants to Feed Your Dog, Too
text:
General Mills Inc., beset by stagnant sales of cereal and yogurt, is paying around $8 billion for a pet-food business to help it generate revenue growth in the U.S.
The Minneapolis-based food conglomerate, which hasnâ€™t sold pet food since the 1960s, said Friday it plans to buy Blue Buffalo Pet Products Inc. as it looks for a piece of the rapidly expanding natural pet-food market.
